phrases: the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs
how quickly daft jumping zebras vex
sphinx of black quartz judge my vow
two driven jocks help fax my big quiz
the five boxing wizards jump quickly
jackdaws love my big sphinx of quartz
we promptly judged antique ivory buckles for the next prize
a wizard's job is to vex chumps quickly in fog
watch jeopardy alex trebek fun tv quiz game
sentences: Programming is the art of telling another human what one wants the computer to do.
The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad.
Any fool can write code that a computer can understand.
Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
In order to be irreplaceable, one must always be different.
Knowledge is power, but enthusiasm pulls the switch.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal.
It is the courage to continue that counts.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
tech_sentences: Web development combines creativity with technical skills.
JavaScript is the language of the web browser.
React makes building user interfaces much easier.
Node.js allows JavaScript to run on the server.
CSS styling brings designs to life on the web.
HTML provides the structure for web pages.
Git version control tracks changes in your code.
APIs enable different software systems to communicate.
Responsive design ensures websites work on all devices.
Database queries retrieve and manipulate stored data.
Debugging is an essential skill for every developer.
Code reviews help maintain quality and share knowledge.
Testing ensures your application works as expected.
Version control allows teams to collaborate effectively.
Clean code is easier to read and maintain.
Documentation helps others understand your work.
Performance optimization improves user experience.
Security measures protect applications from attacks.
Continuous integration automates the build process.
Agile methodology promotes iterative development cycles.
quotes: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
Code never lies, comments sometimes do.
Programs must be written for people to read.
Controlling complexity is the essence of programming.
Delete code, not comments.
Good code is its own best documentation.
Programming isn't about what you know.
It's about what you can figure out.
The best error message is the one that never shows up.
Weeks of coding can save hours of planning.
A good programmer looks both ways before crossing a one-way street.
Walking on water and developing software are easy if both are frozen.
Without requirements or design, programming is the art of adding bugs.
Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.
The most important property of a program is whether it accomplishes the intention.
Software is a great combination between artistry and engineering.
Optimism is an occupational hazard of programming.
Testing can show the presence of bugs but never their absence.
The function of good software is to make the complex appear simple.
